content:
as simple as a pierrot and as smart scramble your own color scheme it s fun *materials *
american thread company dawn germantown wool or dawn knitting worsted - 40 1-oz balls no 1753 dk nile - 11 1-oz balls no 1731 lt scarlet - 11 1-oz balls no 1709 amber - 11 1-oz balls no 1717 lilac
bone crochet hook no 3 or 4
